headline.print_headline: U.S. Push for Arms Embargo on South Sudan Falls Short
headline.main: U.S. Push for South Sudan Arms Embargo Falls Short at U.N.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Ambassador Samantha Power of the United States said there would be a cost of imposing “no cost” on the combatants....
lead_paragraph: Ambassador Samantha Power of the United States said there would be a cost of imposing “no cost” on the combatants.
